title: Large room near Gayborhood
description: Great size room with large closet and two windows open and available in March. I am leaving due to family needs back home, but have really enjoyed the location of this apartment. 1 shared bathroom, but other house mate works pretty full schedule. Across the street from some awesome cafes ( Jiggy coffee and good karma cafe) and a less than 5 minute walk to Whole Foods/ Acme! Some good green outdoor spaces nearby and also 13 minute walk to all the bars near city hall. There is a shared rooftop space up top that I rarely ever see anyone use and I often workout up there when it is warm. Tons of shared closet space in the main living room. Lease ends up in October with option to renew. Please shoot me a text or call to come check the place out :)

title: Opportunity for Country Living with Beautiful Views
description:
Available for rent is a beautiful and fully renovated carriage home situated on a farm  in Bucks County. Equipped with all modern amenities (gourmet kitchen with Thermador appliances, washer/dryer, remodeled master bathroom, walk-in closet, radiant heated hardwood floors throughout, open concept layout with a terrace to breathtaking views of the pasture, and much much more). This is a must see property. Water/sewer, wifi,  and trash removal included. The tenant will be responsible for electric and propane.
This property is ideal for a professional who values privacy and embraces a clean and healthy lifestyle. Proof of income is required and a credit/background check will be conducted. If seriously interested, please message me for more details about this magnificent property.

title: Philadelphia, PA** this 2 bed/ 2 bath second floor condo**
description: Located in the beautiful Fairmount section, this 2 bed/ 2 bath second floor condo is a city-living gem. Built in 1900 and recently renovated, the new appliances, granite counter tops, and remodeled bathrooms are accented by the original beauty of the exposed brick, high ceilings, crown moldings, and hardwood floors. The condo has a new HVAC system with central A/C, a dishwasher and an in-unit washer/dryer, and tenants have access to organized basement storage and shared courtyard. Two separate hot water heaters (approx. 2 years old) means that tenants can run both showers without concern

title: FURNISHED HOUSE, on old farm property
description:
Malvern, walking distance to Bryn Mawr Rehab, 10-15 mins from Paoli Hospital, Wyeth, Vanguard, Unisys and the Great Valley/Exton corporate centers, West Chester, King of Prussia, 30 mins to center city on the R5. Close to East Goshen park and other recreational facilities, shopping, restaurants and downtown Malvern.
- 1400 sq ft, FULLY FURNISHED, 1 bedrooms, 1 bath, with a large eat-in kitchen and a washer and dryer on site.
- there's a stocked pond on the property if you love to fish, and even a very friendly horse next door to feed. House faces east and is flooded with natural light from sunrise till dusk.
- old-fashioned attention to detail: hardwood floors throughout, solid wood cabinetry, ceramic tile and china fixtures
- wireless internet connection and DTV included
- water, sewer, and trash included, capped allowance for electricity and heat
- pets considered on a case-by-case basis. pet fee will apply.
weekly $850.00, one week rent deposit to reserve
monthly $2750, one month refundable security deposit to reserve. Rent prorated based on move-in date if the monthly rate is chosen.
leases over 6 months require a first and last month rent, plus a refundable security deposit.
Available Feb 20.

title: A 3 bedroom,3 bathroom home with finished basement space !!@@!!
description: Stunning Colonial Home in Andorra! Exactly what you have been waiting for! A perfect location, tucked amongst the Wissahickon Valley Park, on a quiet bend sits 918 East Cathedral Road. A 3 bedroom, 2.5 bathroom home with a garage, finished basement space, 2 car driveway parking and fully fenced in backyard and patio. Exceptional upgrades, newly renovated in 2016, and further improved since. At entrance, you will notice the center hall staircase, open floor plan and beautiful details. Tons of natural sunlight and all main living areas facing the privacy of the backyard. Hardwood flooring, neutral paint colors, dimmable recessed lighting, crown moulding, chair railings, plantation shutters and custom window treatments throughout. The living room boasts a flexible living space and gas fireplace. The kitchen has traditional style cabinetry and modern appliances including a gas cooktop and hood range. The dining room is adjacent to the kitchen with a bay window directly looking out onto the patio and backyard. A half bathroom, pantry and French door to the lower level complete this space. On the second level you will be amazed at the master bedroom suite with cathedral ceilings, on suite bathroom with stall shower and vanity sink, plus a walk in closet. Two other spacious bedrooms with multiple windows, ample closet space and full hall bathroom. The lower level of the home features a flexible, finished living space, currently a second living room and office. The unfinished portion of the basement provides a laundry room and storage area plus access to the garage. A highly sought after location within the city limits, but a suburban like neighborhood. Close to Chestnut Hill, Lafayette Hill, and all Manayunk, Roxborough and Center City have to offer. Ideal positioning to public transportation, major routes and highways.Thanks for your interested kinldy reply with your contact information

title: Welcome to Byrne Lofts, one of Phoenixville's coolest pieces of histor
description: This circa 1895 Corset Mill was converted into 32 unique loft-style units in the heart of downtown Phoenixville. This is your opportunity to own Unit #111 in one of the best locations on the main floor close to the gym, the main entrance with mail/package room, and just steps to the exit to your personal deeded parking spot #32 (which includes an electric outlet if you need a car charging station). Lots of character with original hardwood floors, high ceilings, and large double pane windows for lots of light throughout the day, and black-out shutters for the evening. Open floor plan is perfect for entertaining friends, the beautiful kitchen features Granite countertops, stainless steel appliances, upgraded cabinets, and a large island. This one-bedroom unit features an upgraded tiled bathroom, and washer and dryer in the unit. Don't miss the large storage cabinet offering room for lots of boxes, bins, skis, etc. The secure building includes a fitness center, places to hang and lock your bike inside, community room, and an outdoor community deck. Phoenixville is located at the junction of French Creek and the Schuylkill River, offering many outdoor activities including biking/walking path and boat launch. Downtown offers 10 craft breweries, one distillery, plus numerous restaurants, shops, Colonial Theatre, and farmers market. Close to King of Prussia Mall, Valley Forge Park, and Providence Town Center and Routes 422, 202, 76 & 276.

title: The open-concept living room/dining room area has a vaulted ceiling w
description: A convenient, easy lifestyle beckons you to this exceptional home in Hershey Mill. Home was two bedroom, renovated and converted to a one bedroom with den. (Floor plan can be adjusted to suit your needs). The many updates and renovations, including to the kitchen and bathrooms, make this home a pretty, welcoming oasis. While summer days may seem far now, the private pool at Eaton Village is a wonderful plus during warm weather, as is the patio. Close to everything, and located within historic Chester County, Hersheys Mill has so much to offer, with its low-maintenance, carefree lifestyle a real draw. The parking spot and garage with man door are close to the home. From the front door, with a recently replaced storm door, the wood-floored foyer leads you into this lovely abode. The open-concept living room/dining room area has a vaulted ceiling with a window, and a wood-burning fireplace for cozy cool evenings. Sliders lead to the private patio, with plenty of room for summer barbequing and entertaining. From the living room/dining area, the recently improved kitchen is both pretty and wonderfully functional, with clean, white cabinets and Corian countertops, stainless steel appliances, and attractive wood floors. The charming breakfast area has a large window with a pretty view; the table and chairs are also available for sale with the home. A pantry closet allows for extra storage here as well. The main, carpeted bedroom is attractive, with lovely windows and two closets for plenty of storage. The main bath, recently renovated, has an oversized, step-in shower. The vanity is particularly eye-catching, with a marbled top and lots of drawers

109 E4th Ave 2 Conshohocken, PA  19428$1500.00 / Month---------------------------Interested in this property?Reply to this listing for more information.---------------------------Property Details:1 BEDROOMS | 1 BATHROOMSLocation, location, location! This generous 1 bedroom/bathroom has a private entrance on the ground floor. The oversized living room offers ample closet space; an eat-in kitchen with lots of cooking area; a charming master-bedroom with loads of natural light; and a full bathroom together with a washer/dryer in the unit complete this hidden gem.
The apartment is made up of a total of 7 units and the vibe of the building is amazing - everyone gets along and everyone is nice to each other. This unit is one the largest, most private / secluded of them all. The large back yard is perfect for relaxing, playing and entertaining. The apartment is a 2 minute walk to restaurants, parks, shops and much more - it's conveniently located near public transportation and all major roadways. Of course, pets are welcome.
Private secure garage available for your car or storage is available with the apartment ($270/month).***Cats, Small Dogs, Large Dogs Allowed***Property Type: ApartmentLease Terms:$1500.00/Month$1500.00 DepositLease Length: One YearAvailable:03/15/2023Unit Amenities:Dishwasher Refrigerator Dryer Washer Microwave Freezer OvenBuilding Amenities:Cable Ready Accessibility Features Lawn On Site Laundry Near Parks Secure Building Garage Bicycle Parking---------------------------Interested in this property?Reply to this listing for more information.
